title: I handlettered and printed this Argentina World Champions 2022 poster in Gold and Green foil. It came out amazing!!!

author: matiac
text: Any particular reason you put Dybalas name there? Kinda would work better with either Messi or Martinez or Di Maria in green. Awesome poster though!

author: [deleted]
text: It honestly was just a bit of a random placement there but you're right.

author: yesalrightno

text: Your mother made a nice wish in bed with me last night
